infoSection.text:
If you are a service provider, we provide you with a delicate opportunity: connect with our users!

It works like Facebook. Create your own page. Publish articles, products and upload videos. It is possible to search for your phone number, company and contact information. The page is integrated to our AIS.

approach_text:

We are open to wishes for improving our service for your convenience.
